original: 「江東士兵精壯、糧草充足，擁長江天險，卻希望其主屈膝降賊，不顧天下人恥笑。這麼說來，我主才是不怕操賊的真英雄啊！」
text: "Jiangdong soldiers are strong and strong, with sufficient food and grass, and the natural dangers of the Yangtze River, but hope that their lord will bend his knees and bring down thieves, regardless of the ridicule of the world. So, my lord is a true hero who is not afraid of thief!"
